name: Bug report
about: Only trivially reproducible bugs will be considered
title: ""
labels: bug

---

ðŸš« Feature and enhancement requests are likely to be closed without comment.

For a bug report to be reviewed, include instructions to easily reproduce it:

- Exact steps from a fresh clone or install to trigger the failure
- Minimal input or data required
- Observed result and the expected result
- System details (OS, runtime versions, browser if relevant)

If you have shell access to a running instance of POSSE Party, please also paste the results of:

```
cd posse_party
./bin/status
```

Issues missing a reproducible path are likely to be closed without review.
